user.title: Meraki Dashboard
user.description: Set up the Meraki Dashboard integration

organization.title: Select Organization
organization.description: Select the Meraki organization to monitor.

data_description.organization_id: The Meraki organization containing your networks and devices.
data_description.name: Name for this integration instance (optional).

device_selection.title: Configure Devices and Options
device_selection.description: Found {device_count} MT sensor device(s). Select which devices to monitor or leave empty to monitor all devices.

data_description.name: Name for this integration instance.
data_description.selected_devices: Choose specific devices to monitor. Leave empty to monitor all devices and automatically discover new ones.
data_description.scan_interval: How often to fetch sensor data. Meraki MT sensors update every 20 minutes by default.
data_description.auto_discovery: Automatically discover and add new MT devices.
data_description.discovery_interval: How often to scan for new devices when auto-discovery is enabled.

reauth.title: Reauthenticate Meraki Dashboard
reauth.description: Please provide your updated API key

init.title: Configure Meraki Dashboard
init.description: Configure scan intervals and device selection. MT sensors now use historical data endpoints for complete data capture.

hub_intervals.title: Hub-Specific Intervals
hub_intervals.description: Configure individual scan intervals for each hub. MT sensor intervals are capped at 20 minutes (1200 seconds) to ensure complete historical data capture.

api_key_expired.title: Meraki API Key Expired
api_key_expired.description: Your Meraki Dashboard API key for '{config_entry_title}' has expired or is invalid. Please update your API key in the integration settings.

init.title: Update API Key
init.description: Your Meraki Dashboard API key has expired or is invalid. Please enter a new valid API key.

network_access_lost.title: Network Access Lost
network_access_lost.description: Lost access to network '{network_name}' in '{config_entry_title}'. This may be due to network configuration changes or temporary connectivity issues.

init.title: Fix Network Access Issue
init.description: Access to network '{network_name}' has been lost. Click 'Submit' to attempt reconnection. If the problem persists, check your network configuration in the Meraki Dashboard.

device_discovery_failed.title: Device Discovery Failed
device_discovery_failed.description: Failed to discover devices in hub '{hub_name}' for '{config_entry_title}'. This may be due to API rate limits or temporary network issues.

init.title: Fix Device Discovery Issue
init.description: Device discovery failed for hub '{hub_name}'. Click 'Submit' to retry device discovery manually.

update_hub_data.name: Update Hub Data
update_hub_data.description: Force immediate data update for a specific hub with historical data collection

discover_devices.name: Discover Devices
discover_devices.description: Scan for new devices in a specific hub

update_all_hubs.name: Update All Hubs
update_all_hubs.description: Force immediate data update for all hubs with historical data collection

discover_all_devices.name: Discover All Devices
discover_all_devices.description: Scan for new devices across all networks
